dotnetType.name: DecimalSerializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A serializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.DoubleSchema" /> and attempts to map it
            to any provided type.

overloads.summary: Creates a new decimal serializer builder case.

returns.summary:
An action that accepts an object and a <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and writes the serialized
            object to the stream.

overloads.summary: Builds a decimal serializer for a type-schema pair.
The codec that generated serializers should use for write operations.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DecimalSerializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinarySerializerBuilderCase
